PKS soal Rangkulan Paloh-Sohibul Disorot Jokowi: Dua Hati Bertemu
07 Nov 2019, 12:12 by Rolando Fransiscus Sihombing
Jakarta - Partai Keadilan Sejahtera (PKS) menilai sikap Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) menyinggung rangkulan Ketum Partai NasDem Surya Paloh dengan Presiden PKS Sohibul Iman adalah gurauan. PKS merasa wajar bila gurauan Jokowi ditafsirkan banyak makna.
"Pak Jokowi gurau saja. Tapi namanya Presiden, guraunya pun ditafsir banyak pihak," kata Ketua DPP PKS Mardani Ali Sera kepada detikcom, Kamis (7/11/2019).
Mardani mengatakan partainya selalu menjaga silaturahmi dengan pimpinan partai lain, termasuk dengan Paloh, yang sempat mengunjungi kantor DPP PKS, Rabu (30/10). Dia mengatakan jika Jokowi pun menyambangi kantor DPP PKS pun akan diterima.
"PKS selalu menjaga silaturahim dengan semua pihak. Apalagi ada tetamu yang datang mesti disambut. Kalau Pak Jokowi mau silaturahim ke PKS pun, akan kami terima. Mesti kita biasakan hubungan antar elite selalu rukun, pelukan itu menyejukkan," ujar dia.

PKS about Paloh-Sohibul's Embrace Highlighted Jokowi: Two Hearts Meet
Nov 7 2019, 12:12 AM by Rolando Fransiscus Sihombing
Jakarta - The Prosperous Justice Party (PKS) considers President Joko Widodo's (Jokowi) attitude to offend the Chairman of the NasDem Party Surya Paloh with PKS President Sohibul Iman as a joke. PKS feels it is natural if Jokowi's joke is interpreted with a lot of meaning.
"Mr. Jokowi just joked. But the name of the President, his jokes were interpreted by many parties," PKS DPP Chairman Mardani Ali Sera told AFP on Thursday (11/07/2019).
Mardani said his party always kept in touch with other party leaders, including Paloh, who had visited the PKS DPP office on Wednesday (10/30). He said if Jokowi visited the PKS DPP office it would be accepted.
"PKS always maintains friendship with all parties. Moreover, there are guests who come must be welcomed. If Mr. Jokowi wants to be friendly to PKS, we will accept it. We must make it a habit of getting in touch with the elite always in harmony, the embrace is soothing," he said.
